QuestData.Title: Return to Veil Terokk
QuestData.Description: <A small note is tied to the kaliri's foot.>$B$B"Percy should have brought with him a basket of goods, assuming he didn't dump it off somewhere along the way. The contents are a token of my gratitude and an apology for the altercation with your scout.$B$BI must urge you to return to Veil Terokk so we may press forward with our plans.$B$B- Reshad "
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Reshad in Veil Terokk.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Reshad in Veil Terokk.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you for returning to us, $p. I must admit we are sorely in need of your help.
